feed.title: bcd-watch: New baselines (weekly)
feed.subtitle: A feed that summarizes changes to BCD weekly

entry.title: BCD New Baselines Report, Tue Jun 25 2024 - Tue Jul 02 2024
entry.summary: Weekly summary of new Baseline items in BCD data
entry.content:
BCD New Baselines Report, Tue Jul 02 2024

Summary of Baseline changes
from Tue Jun 25 2024 20:30:19 GMT+0000 (Coordinated Universal Time)
to Tue Jul 02 2024 10:05:40 GMT+0000 (Coordinated Universal Time)

61 new Baseline implementations

api

  1. ResizeObserver ➞ observe ➞ options_box_parameter  ➞  Added to Safari
  2. createImageBitmap ➞ options_imageOrientation_parameter ➞ from-image  ➞  Added to Firefox, Chrome, Safari

css

  1. properties ➞ white-space-collapse ➞ break-spaces  ➞  Added to Safari
  2. properties ➞ white-space-collapse ➞ collapse  ➞  Added to Safari
  3. properties ➞ white-space-collapse ➞ preserve  ➞  Added to Safari
  4. properties ➞ white-space-collapse ➞ preserve-breaks  ➞  Added to Safari

html

  1. elements ➞ link ➞ rel ➞ dns-prefetch  ➞  Added to Safari

svg

  1. global_attributes ➞ class ➞ animation_support  ➞  Added to Chrome, Safari
  2. global_attributes ➞ clip  ➞  Added to Firefox, Chrome, Safari
  3. global_attributes ➞ clip-path  ➞  Added to Firefox, Chrome, Safari
